Text: Great book but atrocious scan that is mostly unreadable. We appreciate your efforts but please look at files before you upload them.

@privateer2day

Do you actually think i upload files without checking them first???

My #1 priority is quality all the books i upload are checked twice to see if they are complete and readable.If it's not good enough for me then it's not good enough for down loaders.

I throw out 40% of books i get because of quality issues.The copy of "Earth Sheltered Houses'' that i have on my HD is complete,very readable and clear.Your copy must have gotten damaged during transmission that i have no control over.It happens more often to certain books than others

I can't guarantee you will get the exact same copy of the book that i have .I can only hope you will.The Internet is not perfect

There is nothing wrong with the quality of the scan. Both text and images are crisp and very readable.

Thanks for sharing, although I doubt I'll ever build an underground lair for myself... ;-)
